content: wwaatteerr iiss lliiffee hhaatt by lavanya patricella big sister of the standing rock hat this quick bulky weight ribbed beanie is perfect for keeping you and your loved ones warm this season materials us 8 16 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge ​​ us 8 dpns or size needed to obtain gauge ​​ 105 yards of bulky weight yarn ​​ 1 stitch marker measurements 16 around 9 long one size fits most will comfortably fit head circumferences from 18 -23 gauge 12 stitches and 20 row = 4 in stockinette stitch on us 8 needles or size needed to obtain gauge ​ ​​ abbreviations co = cast on using the knit on method ​​ k = knit stitch ​​ k2tog = knit 2 stitches together ​​ p = purl stitch ​​ ​​ p2tog = purl 2 stitches together ​​ instructions with us 8 co 72 sts being careful not to twist place marker and join in the round ​ row 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round ​​ repeat row 1 40 more times ​ ​​ begin decrease shaping switching to dpns when necessary row 42 *k2 p2tog repeat from * to end of round 54 sts ​​ row 43 *k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round ​​ row 44 *k2tog p1 repeat from * to end of round 36 sts ​​ row 45 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round ​​ row 46 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 18 sts ​​ row 47 knit to end of round ​​ row 48 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 9 sts ​​ cut tail draw through remaining stitches and weave in ends © lavanya patricella for personal use only all rights reserved lavanyapatricella@gmail com ​ ​ http //lavanyapatricella com | http //ravelry com/lavanyapatricella/ | http //instagram com/lavanyapatricella ​ ​ ​
